DOC.brief_summary: Antipsychotics such as risperidone could induce amenorrhea in schizophrenic patients. The investigators conducted a randomized, placebo-controlled study to test the efficacy of metformin for antipsychotic induced amenorrhea in schizophrenia patients.
DOC.brief_title: Metformin for Treatment Antipsychotic Induced Amenorrhea in Female Schizophrenic Patients
DOC.criteria: schizophrenia patient amenorrhea for more than three months after antipsychotic treatment liver or renal diseases pregnant or lactating women cardiovascular diseases hypertension or diabetes mellitus
